00030 Connector::~Connector()
00031 {
00032     // Stop all other activities...
00033     TcpServer::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00034     TcpServer::Stop();
00035     UdpExchange::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00036     UdpExchange::Stop();
00037
00038     Disconnect();
00039 }

00041 void Connector::Create(int port_tcp, int port_udp)
00042 {
00043     // REVIEW add support of UDP Port
00044     UdpExchange::Create(port_udp);
00045
00046     SimpleString tmps = MagicUdp;
00047     tmps +=    ":";
00048     tmps += UdpExchange::GetUdpPort();
00049     TcpServer::SetSyncLinkData( tmps );
00050     TcpServer::SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00051     TcpServer::Create(port_tcp);
00052 }

00054 void Connector::SetName(const SimpleString NewName)
00055 {
00056     // Change to all my views...
00057     TcpServer::SetName(NewName);
00058     UdpExchange::SetName(NewName);
00059
00060     ListClients.Lock();
00061     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00062     {
00063         ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->SetName(NewName);
00064     }
00065     ListClients.Unlock();
00066 }

00069 {
00070     // Change to all my views...
00071     return TcpServer::GetName();

00074 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Connector::ProcessLyncSyncMsg( MsgSocketCallBackData * MsgData, MsgSocket * MyMsgSocket )
00075 {
00076     Connector * pThis = (Connector*)MsgData->userData1;
00077
00078     if ( ((UdpExchange*)pThis)->GetUdpPort() == 0 )
00079     {
00080         // We do not care about UDP port...
00081         return;
00082     }
00083
00084     // Check if the data if Empty
00085     if ( MsgData->Msg.GetLength() != 0 )
00086     {
00087         // Ok, we've got the Linc Data
00088         SimpleString tmpBuf((const char*)MsgData->Msg.GetBuffer());
00089         SimpleString tmpUdp = MagicUdp;
00090
00091         SimpleString UDPPort = ValueFromKey( tmpBuf, tmpUdp );
00092
00093         if ( UDPPort.GetLength() != 0 )
00094         {
00095             UdpConnection udpConnection;
00096             udpConnection.pid = MsgData->Msg.GetPeerId();
00097
00098             // Ok, we have an UDP port at the oposite side
00099             // Try to accept it
00100             // udpConnection.SetAddr( (const struct sockaddr_in*)DestAddr );
00101
00102             SimpleString ConnectedHost = MyMsgSocket->GetSocket()->GetConnectedHost();
00103
00104             int tmpudp = atoi( UDPPort.GetStr() );
00105             //REVIEW
00106             // udpConnection.addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00107             // udpConnection.addr.sin_port = htons(tmpudp);
00108
00109             // he = Socket::GetHostByName(ConnectedHost.GetStr());
00110             // udpConnection.addr.sin_addr = *((struct in_addr*)he->h_addr);
00111             // memset(&(udpConnection.addr.sin_zero), 0, 8);
00112             Socket::FillAddrIn(&udpConnection.addr, ConnectedHost, tmpudp );
00113
00114             pThis->AcceptConnection( udpConnection, true );
00115         }
00116     }
00117 }

00119 unsigned int Connector::ConnectTo(const SimpleString addr, int port_tcp) // , int port_udp)
00120 {
00121     TcpClient* tcpclient = new OMISCID_TLM TcpClient();
00122
00123     if ( tcpclient == NULL )
00124     {
00125         return 0;
00126     }
00127
00128     tcpclient->SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00129     tcpclient->SetName(TcpServer::GetName());
00130     tcpclient->SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00131
00132     // REVIEW : done by the TCP Port
00133     if ( UdpExchange::GetUdpPort() == 0 )
00134     {
00135         UdpExchange::Create(0);
00136
00137         SimpleString tmps = MagicUdp;
00138         tmps +=    ":";
00139         tmps += UdpExchange::GetUdpPort();
00140         TcpServer::SetSyncLinkData( tmps );
00141         TcpServer::SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00142     }
00143
00144     // Set UDP Port as property for the Sync Link paquet of the TCP Connection
00145     tcpclient->SetSyncLinkData( TcpServer::GetSyncLinkData() );
00146
00147     // the UDP connection will be filled later
00148     ClientConnection * pConnection = new OMISCID_TLM ClientConnection( tcpclient, NULL );
00149
00150     // add the client to my list of connected Socket
00151     ListClients.Lock();
00152     ListClients.Add(pConnection);
00153     ListClients.Unlock();
00154
00155     tcpclient->ConnectToServer(addr, port_tcp);
00156
00157     // REVIEW
00158     // tcpclient->SendSyncLinkMsg(); => done in ConnectToServer
00159     // if ( tcpclient->WaitSyncLinkMsg() == false )
00160     //{
00161         // We do not manadge to
00162     //    TraceError( "Could not initialise connection in time, default mode is TCP until initialisation is done.\n" );
00163     //}
00164
00165     // Copy my callback objects to the new connection
00166     TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Lock();
00167     for( TcpServer::CallbackObjects.First(); TcpServer::CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Next() )
00168     {
00169         tcpclient->AddCallbackObject( TcpServer::CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() );
00170     }
00171     TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00172
00173     while( tcpclient->IsConnected() )
00174     {
00175         if ( tcpclient->WaitSyncLinkMsg(30) == true )
00176         {
00177             break;
00178         }
00179     }
00180
00181     return tcpclient->GetPeerPid();
00182 }

00184 void Connector::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00185 {
00186     // Check validity of a service Id
00187     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00188     {
00189         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00190 #ifdef DEBUG
00191         //        fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for Connector. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00192 #endif
00193     }
00194
00195     TcpServer::SetServiceId(pid);
00196     UdpExchange::SetServiceId(pid);
00197
00198     ListClients.Lock();
00199     for( ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd();  ListClients.Next())
00200     {
00201         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00202         {
00203             (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->SetServiceId(pid);
00204         }
00205         else
00206         {
00207             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00208             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00209         }
00210     }
00211     ListClients.Unlock();
00212 }
00213
00214 void Connector::SendToAll(int len, const char* buf, bool fastsend)
00215 {
00216     // OmiscidTrace( "in SerndToAll\n");
00217     if ( fastsend && len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE )
00218     {
00219         fastsend = false;
00220     }
00221
00222     if( !fastsend )
00223     {
00224         //send to all client of server
00225         TcpServer::SendToAllClients(len, buf);
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00230         UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Lock();
00231                 try
00232                 {
00233                 for(TcpServer::listConnections.First();  TcpServer::listConnections.NotAtEnd();
00234             TcpServer::listConnections.Next())
00235         {
00236             unsigned int tcp_pid = (TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid();
00237
00238             if(!(TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->IsConnected())
00239             {
00240                 delete TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent();
00241                 TcpServer::listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00242
00243                 UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId(tcp_pid);
00244             }
00245             else
00246             {
00247                 UdpConnection* udp_found =  UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(tcp_pid);
00248                 if (udp_found)
00249                 {
00250                     UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, udp_found);
00251                 }
00252                 else
00253                 {
00254                     TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent()->Send(len, buf);
00255                 }
00256             }
00257         }
00258                 } catch(...) {
00259                 }
00260
00261         UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00262         TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00263     }
00264
00265     // send to all server where it is connected
00266     ListClients.Lock();
00267     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00268     {
00269         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00270         {
00271             try
00272             {
00273                 if( fastsend && (ListClients.GetCurrent())->udpConnection )
00274                 {
00275                     UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, (ListClients.GetCurrent())->udpConnection);
00276                 }
00277                 else
00278                 {
00279                     ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->SendToServer(len, buf);
00280                 }
00281             }
00282             catch( SocketException &e )
00283             {
00284                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00285             }
00286         }
00287         else
00288         {
00289             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00290             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00291         }
00292     }
00293     ListClients.Unlock();
00294     // OmiscidTrace( "out SendToAll\n");
00295 }
00296
00297 int Connector::SendToPeer(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid, bool fastsend)
00298 {
00299     int ret = SOCKET_ERROR;
00300
00301     // If we can not send it fast, let's send is slower
00302     if ( fastsend && len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE )
00303     {
00304         fastsend = false;
00305     }
00306
00307     // Search between my client connections
00308     ListClients.Lock();
00309
00310     ClientConnection* cc = FindClientConnectionFromId(pid);
00311     if ( cc )
00312     {
00313         try
00314         {
00315             if ( fastsend && cc->udpConnection )
00316             {
00317                 ret = UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, cc->udpConnection);
00318             }
00319             else
00320             {
00321                 ret = cc->tcpClient->SendToServer(len, buf);
00322             }
00323         }
00324         catch( SocketException &e )
00325         {
00326             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to peer %8.8x : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00327         }
00328         ListClients.Unlock();
00329         return ret;
00330     }
00331     ListClients.Unlock();
00332
00333     //recherche sur les connexions au serveur
00334     if( fastsend ) //recherche dans les connexion su serveur udp
00335     {
00336         ret = UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, pid);
00337         if ( ret > 0 )
00338         {
00339             return ret;
00340         }
00341     }
00342
00343     //recherche dans les connexion su serveur tcp
00344     ret = TcpServer::SendToClient(len, buf, pid);
00345     if ( ret > 0 )
00346     {
00347         return ret;
00348     }
00349     return SOCKET_ERROR;
00350 }

00352 bool Connector::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00353 {
00354     //printf("Connector::SetCallBackOnRecv\n");
00355
00356     if ( TcpServer::AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject) == false )
00357     {
00358         return false;
00359     }
00360
00361     UdpExchange::AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00362
00363     ListClients.Lock();
00364     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00365     {
00366         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00367         {
00368             (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00369         }
00370         else
00371         {
00372             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00373             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00374         }
00375     }
00376     ListClients.Unlock();
00377
00378     return true;
00379 }

00381 bool Connector::RemoveCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00382 {
00383     //printf("Connector::SetCallBackOnRecv\n");
00384
00385     if ( TcpServer::RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject) == false )
00386     {
00387         return false;
00388     }
00389
00390     UdpExchange::RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00391
00392     ListClients.Lock();
00393     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00394     {
00395         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00396             (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00397         else
00398         {
00399             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00400             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00401         }
00402     }
00403     ListClients.Unlock();
00404
00405     return true;
00406 }
00407
00408 UdpConnection* Connector::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool NewConnection )
00409 {
00410     // OmiscidTrace( "in Connector::acceptConnection(UdpConnection*)\n");
00411
00412     ClientConnection  * ClientCon = NULL;
00413
00414     // Search in my Client connection
00415     ListClients.Lock();
00416     for( ListClients.First(); (ClientCon == NULL) && ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00417     {
00418         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid() == udp_connect.pid)
00419         {
00420             ClientCon = ListClients.GetCurrent();
00421         }
00422     }
00423
00424     // Ok, we've got it, retrieve it
00425     if ( ClientCon )
00426     {
00427         if ( NewConnection )
00428         {
00429             // We must fill the updConnection
00430             if ( ClientCon->udpConnection == NULL )
00431             {
00432                 ClientCon->udpConnection = new OMISCID_TLM UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00433             }
00434             else
00435             {
00436                 ClientCon->udpConnection->SetAddr( udp_connect.getAddr() );
00437             }
00438         }
00439
00440         ListClients.Unlock();
00441         return ClientCon->udpConnection;
00442     }
00443
00444     ListClients.Unlock();
00445
00446     // Now search in the person connected to me
00447
00448     UdpConnection* udp_found = NULL;
00449     MsgSocket*     tcp_found = NULL;
00450
00451     //std::cout << "recherche dans server connexion\n";
00452     TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00453         try
00454         {
00455
00456     for(TcpServer::listConnections.First(); (tcp_found == NULL) && TcpServer::listConnections.NotAtEnd();
00457         TcpServer::listConnections.Next())
00458     {
00459         // OmiscidTrace( "among  connexion server : %u\n", (*its)->GetPeerPid());
00460         if ( udp_connect.pid == (TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid())
00461         {
00462             tcp_found = TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent();
00463         }
00464     }
00465
00466     if ( tcp_found )
00467     {
00468         if( tcp_found->IsConnected() )
00469         {
00470             udp_found = UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(udp_connect.pid);
00471             if ( NewConnection )
00472             {
00473                 if ( udp_found != NULL )
00474                 {
00475                     udp_found->SetAddr( udp_connect.getAddr() );
00476                 }
00477                 else
00478                 {
00479                     // OmiscidTrace("Creation connection udp associe TcpServer\n");
00480                     udp_found = new OMISCID_TLM UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00481                     if ( udp_found )
00482                     {
00483                         UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Add(udp_found);
00484                     }
00485                 }
00486             }
00487         }
00488         else
00489         {
00490             // The peer is not connected anymore, remove it from my list
00491             TcpServer::listConnections.Remove(tcp_found);
00492             UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId( udp_connect.pid );
00493             delete tcp_found;
00494         }
00495     }
00496         } catch(...) {
00497         }
00498
00499     TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00500
00501     if( udp_found == NULL )
00502     {
00503         OmiscidTrace( "UDP connection not available fo peer %8.8x\n", udp_connect.pid);
00504     }
00505
00506     return udp_found;
00507 }

00510 int Connector::GetNbConnection()
00511 {
00512     ListClients.Lock();
00513     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00514     {
00515         if(!(ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00516         {
00517             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00518             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00519         }
00520     }
00521     int nb = (int)(ListClients.GetNumberOfElements() + TcpServer::GetNbConnections());
00522     ListClients.Unlock();
00523     return nb;
00524 }
00525
00526 int Connector::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& listId)
00527 {
00528     int nb = TcpServer::GetListPeerId(listId);
00529     ListClients.Lock();
00530     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00531     {
00532         if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00533         {
00534             listId.Add((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid());
00535             nb++;
00536         }
00537         else
00538         {
00539             delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00540             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00541         }
00542     }
00543     ListClients.Unlock();
00544     return nb;
00545 }

00547 void Connector::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
00548 {
00549     TcpServer::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00550     ListClients.Lock();
00551     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00552     {
00553         (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00554     }
00555     ListClients.Unlock();
00556 }

00558 ComTools* Connector::Cast()
00559 {
00560     return dynamic_cast<ComTools*>(this);
00561 }
00562
00563 ClientConnection* Connector::FindClientConnectionFromId(unsigned int pid)
00564 {
00565     // Check first for a specific connection
00566     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00567     {
00568         if( (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected() == false )
00569         {
00570             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00571         }
00572         else if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid() == pid)
00573         {
00574             return ListClients.GetCurrent();
00575         }
00576     }
00577
00578     unsigned int lpid = pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00579
00580     // Fallback, search for a port
00581     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00582     {
00583         if(!(ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00584             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00585         else if((ListClients.GetCurrent()->GetPeerPid()& ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) == lpid)
00586         {
00587             return ListClients.GetCurrent();
00588         }
00589     }
00590
00591     return NULL;
00592 }

00631 void Connector::Disconnect()
00632 {
00633     // disconnect every one in my two other side
00634     TcpServer::Disconnect();
00635     UdpExchange::Disconnect();
00636
00637     // disconnect my connections
00638     ListClients.Lock();
00639     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00640     {
00641         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00642         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00643     }
00644     ListClients.Unlock();
00645 }
00646
00649 bool Connector::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00650 {
00651     bool ret = false;
00652     unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00653
00654     // Disconnect all connection
00655     ret = ret || TcpServer::DisconnectPeerId(SearchId);
00656     ret = ret || UdpExchange::DisconnectPeerId(SearchId);
00657
00658     // remove locally the PeerId
00659     ListClients.Lock();
00660     for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00661     {
00662         if ( SearchId == (ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->GetPeerId() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID ) )
00663         {
00664             ret = true;
00665             ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00666         }
00667     }
00668     ListClients.Unlock();
00669
00670     return ret;
00671 }
